author: jm
msg: bug 4331: change S value to be 0.03, which reduces FPs and FNs at the ends of the Bayes score range, at the cost of increasing 'unsure' cases.  since unsure means BAYES_50, no points, we easily make up for those with other rules, so this works better for us
